persistentCharacters.name: Prince Diamond
persistentCharacters.notes:
Welcome to the Tracker!
Press [Join Battle] to track characters' initiative and turn status.

persistentCharacters.name: Perfect Soul
persistentCharacters.notes:
You can replace characters' portraits by dragging-and-dropping images from other web pages.
(Only works with a mouse, sorry. ;_;)

persistentCharacters.name: Volfer
persistentCharacters.notes: Use the Notes fields to write down characters' health, attacks, defenses, etc.

persistentCharacters.name: Novia Claro
persistentCharacters.notes: Press [Save] at the top, and your browser will remember everything for next time.
